title: OpenAI Dev Day 2024: 4 Major Updates in a Nutshell

Below are the four key updates, why they're exciting, and how you can use them."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"1-real-time-api-speech-and-functionality-at-lightning-speed",children:"1. Real-Time API: Speech and Functionality at Lightning Speed"}),"
",t(a.p,{children:["OpenAI's ",n(a.strong,{children:"Real-Time API"})," enables live, real-time ",n(a.strong,{children:"speech-to-speech"})," interactions. This API not only supports text and audio input/output but also allows for ",n(a.strong,{children:"function calling"}),", making apps far more interactive and responsive.
elopers, making it easier to build responsive, cost-effective, and powerful AI-driven applications. To dive deeper, check out ",n(a.a,{href:"https://github.com/openai/openai-real-time-api-example",children:"OpenAI's GitHub Repo"})," or visit the official ",n(a.a,{href:"https://openai.com/devday/",children:"OpenAI Dev Day page"}),"."]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:t}=e.components||{};return t?n(t,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
